mapper.select: SELECT di.item_id, di.dict_id, d.name AS dictName, di.code, di.`name`, di.icon, di.remark, di.`system`, di.ordinal, di.create_time, di.create_user_name, di.create_user_id, di.update_time FROM inbyte_dict_item LEFT JOIN inbyte_dict d ON di.dict_id = d.dict_id WHERE item_id = #{itemId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
